sentences.sContent: Bill clamped the horn to the handlebar of his bicycle.
sentences.sContent_eng: Bill clamped the horn to the handlebar of his bicycle.
sentences.sCn: 比尔把喇叭夹紧在脚踏车的龙头上。

sentences.sContent: Equipped with a20-inch colored monitor and advanced software the trainer hold the handlebar and he will enter a magical world of fictitious reality.
sentences.sContent_eng: Equipped with a20-inch colored monitor and advanced software the trainer hold the handlebar and he will enter a magical world of fictitious reality.
sentences.sCn: 配备20英寸的彩色监视器和先进的软件，练功者手握车把，就会进入虚拟现实的神奇世界。

remMethod.val: handle(柄， 把手) + bar(条， 棒) → 手把

trans.tranOther: The handlebar or handlebars of a bicycle consist of a curved metal bar with handles at each end which are used for steering
